document.full_text: new york would welcome barclays plc  if the bank decided to move its headquarters from britain, the city's mayor said, in comments that suggested that the big apple might be courting the bank.
document.title: bloomberg says barclays would feel at home in n.y.
lines_and_colors: new york would welcome barclays plc  if the bank decided to move its headquarters from britain, the city's mayor said, in comments that suggested that the big apple might be courting the bank.
